#include<bits/stdc++.h>
#define ll long long int
using namespace std;
ll gcd(ll x, ll y){
    if(y==0) return x;
    else return gcd(y,x%y);
}
int main(){
    int t;
    cin>>t;
    while(t--){
        int n;
        cin>>n;
        if(n%2){
            cout<<"Lannisters always pays their debts\n";
        }
        else cout<<"Valar Morghulis"<<endl;
    }
}
